Comments_List: 2hrs for taking the course and 2.5hrs for homework
This course is excellent if you want to study statistical genetics.

strengths: covered a lot of interesting material, gained experience with a few important algorithms
weakness: spent the majority of our time getting a narrow view of specific paper results
suggestion: more real-world applications or a final project, such as a draft manuscript
Dr. Zhao was very knowledgable and thoughtful in his presentations and answers. However, it might be nice to spark more discussion in class and provide more opportunities for research.
I will recommend this course to students who are interested in statistical genetics.
this was an interesting class, but with some more interactive content it could be one of the best classes in the department, as this is a topic that a lot of students care about.
